alert.note: Alert for Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 23 at 8:25AM CDT until June 23 at 9:30AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Cherry County in north central Nebraska... * Until 930 AM CDT. * At 825 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 16 miles southeast of Gordon, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Medicine Lake, Highway 61 crossing the Snake River, Eli, Highway 61 Crossing The Niobrara River, Indian Hill, Intersection of Highway 61 and Shadbolt Road, Intersection of Highway 20 and Irwin Road, Rock Hill and Bayonne. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 114 and 125, and between mile markers 141 and 153. Highway 61 between mile markers 197 and 224. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
